name: Emoji Smash - Desert Crusin'
description:
Emoji Smash is a Motocross style game where you collect coins and do tricks on your bike. This game is for those people who like/dislike emojis and just want to smash them with your riding skills.

Try to stay upright in this fast paced game with obstacles such as bombs and spikes testing you along the way. All Emojis have bonus coins in them, the trick is knowing how much (or little) air you need in order too receive those bonus coins.

Are you the best? Come and prove it and challenge your friends while you are at it!

Ohhhh, and don't forget, if you fall on your head, the GAME is OVER!

-Easy Game Play
-Game Center Connected
-Lots of Levels

Support: itrapapps.com
